Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: This heart is built for a larger body, and pumps a lot of blood. It also tires people out.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: strong heart

values.description: Strong pulses are going through [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest. They are getting worse and worse.
A painful spasm of a growing heart is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s heart has grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. [PAWN_pronoun] will need to rest more often, however.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A large, powerful lung for intensive breathing.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: bellowing lung

values.description: Breathing is becoming more and more difficult for [PAWN_nameDef] as [PAWN_pronoun]'s lung has started to expand.
A painful spasm of a growing lung is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s lung has grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. The larger size leads to hyperventilation, causing slight dizziness.

li.label: paragon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s lung has acquired a reinforced voicebox that can focus [PAWN_nameDef]'s breath into a roar capable of terrifying and overloading mechanical auditory sensors.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: An expanded frontal lobe for bright morphs.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: expanded frontal lobe

values.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is recently having more headaches than usual.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s having a painful, constant migraine. It feels like [PAWN_nameDef]'s brain is expandiing.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s frontal lobe has expanded. With these new connections, many problems are now trivial for [PAWN_nameDef].

li.label: paragon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s enhanced brain is so adept at logical problem solving [PAWN_objective] can solve differencial equations on the fly, calculating ballistics trajectories is a comparatively simple matter.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A stomach which is resilient to most germs.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: iron stomach

values.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s stomach is sometimes hurting a bit after eating. Nothing too worrying though.
[PAWN_nameDef] seems to have painful disgestion troubles, like if [PAWN_possessive] gut was evolving.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s gut is now resilient to dangerous and rotten food, and [PAWN_nameDef] could eat almost everything.
